document.full_text: los angeles mayor antonio villaraigosa has agreed to pay a fine of $42,000 for accepting free tickets to shows and sports events such as lakers games, in the largest ethics-related fine a california agency has ever imposed.
document.title: los angeles mayor to pay record fine over free tickets
lines_and_colors: los angeles mayor antonio villaraigosa has agreed to pay a fine of $42,000 for accepting free tickets to shows and sports events such as lakers games, in the largest ethics-related fine a california agency has ever imposed.
